WRITING.TEXT: Thank you, i had the feeling that i needed to share this before it goes back to where it was for another 70 years.
I think he got discharged from an american pow camp

WRITING.TITLE: WW2 Diary and Album of a German Soldier
WRITING.TEXT:
Found this old diary of a distant relative in our attic.
I think it provides some interesting insight to the live of a normal soldier from 1939-45.
I did my best to translate it, but the old handwriting is hard to read and my english is not the best.
https://imgur.com/a/dpWez#Vc1CqXO

In Austria our lawmakers hate modified cars...
Want other wheels than stock? You have to go to a special inspection and have the wheels listed in your vehicles registration certificate.
Coilover suspension ? Get your vehicle inspeced by a civil engineer and get a certificate, also must be listed in registration certificate.
Turbo, Supercharger, Chiptuning, Engine Swap: Almost impossible or very expensive to make road legal, must get inspected by civil engineer, full emission testing, test on dyno etc. etc etc...
Because its a nice way to say: GET OFF MY LANE WITH YOUR PEASANT CAR
I just stop by at a coinop carwash and use the high pressure washer with reverse osmosis water. The purified water does not leave any spots and it only costs 50c for a quick wash.

My A5 also has a small rattle in the passenger seat area, the car is very quiet even at higher speed wich makes it even more annoying :(
Pls Update when you find something
I always imagine that NK looks like this http://i.imgur.com/Eo0f8Xp.jpg
He took two spaces, you can see the white line under the car.
Dont be such a baby, ribs grow back...

Always remembers me of this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JrKQRNdLNBY
Nach fest kommt ab / After thight comes loose
